content: **fioriti socks** **pattern** this sock is knit from the cuff down and features a german short row heel the pattern is charted but some written instructions are also provided the last page of the pdf is a printable cheat-sheet to use if you are already an experienced sock knitter a short video tutorial is provided for the edge stitch **yarn** to knit this sock any standard fingering sock yarn will do just fine light colours and solid or semi-solid colourways will make the pattern look best please be aware that this pattern has not been tested which is why i am providing it for free i hope you will enjoy knitting this design
